Walking through the thick forrest, it didn't take long for Shard to
detect =
the massive amounts of energy being put out by a large battle.
He still rea=
lly didn't know where he was, or what was going on, or
who was fighting who=
, but there was only one way to find out, and it
wasn't by listening to the=
se birds chirp all day.

As he got closer, he took a good long look at the =
battle before him
and quickly determined that whatever was going on, it was=
 big. 
Deciding that he was definitely in the mood for some action, he
deci=
ded to hold off on questions and pulled out his rocket launcher. 

Taking a=
im at the large ship everyone else was firing at, he shot both
missiles, th=
en stopped to reload.


((Please keep in mind that blowing stuff up is Shar=
d's specialty, so
these missiles really make things go boom.))
